name: (Spanish) Homepage - Header - All the menu links on the "Help" tab
id: stories/fullRegression/regressionChecklistSpanish.story;(Spanish) Homepage - Header - All the menu links on the "Help" tab

testSteps.description: (Spanish) Homepage - Header - All the menu links on the "Help" tab #1: {menuLinks=preguntas comunes, category=daily}

children.description: Given I am on the Spanish Disaster Assistance homepage
Open page: /es
When I click on the {preguntas comunes} in the Help tab
Click help menu links: preguntas comunes
Then the {preguntas comunes} page should open correctly
Should see page: preguntas comunes

userStory.narrative:
In order to assert that the basic functionality of https://www.disasterassistance.gov/es/ is working
As a tester
I want to run the daily regressions at least twice a day
